prompts: Create a small bug-type Pokemon with orange and black accents and a round body.
Imagine a lively Pokemon that thrives in forests, featuring a vibrant orange shell and tiny wings.
Design a cute bug Pokemon that has distinctive black horns and a friendly demeanor.
Generate an insect-like Pokemon that is primarily orange with white spots and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique color pattern, combining orange and white, perfect for urban environments.
Make a charming Pokemon that resembles a ladybug, emphasizing its round shape and bright colors.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, showcasing orange hues and an approachable look.
